mapper.select: SELECT EVENTDB.event_num As eventNum, EVENTDB.event_name As eventName, EVENTDB.event_kind As eventKind, EVENTDB.event_productNum As eventProductNum, EVENTDB.event_startDatd As eventStartDate, EVENTDB.event_endDatd As eventEndDate, EVENTDB.event_text As eventText FROM EVENTDB
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENTDB (EVENT_NAME, EVENT_KIND, EVENT_PRODUCTNUM, EVENT_STARTDATE, EVENT_ENDDATE, EVENT_TEXT) VALUES (#{eventName}, #{eventKind}, #{eventProductNum}, #{eventStartDate}, #{eventEndDate}, #{eventText})
